reference.title: MOTODEV Video Tutorials view
reference.shortdesc: Presents tutorial videos that demonstrate how to use MOTODEV Studio. This view is part of the MOTODEV Studio for Android perspective. It can also be opened by selecting WindowShow ViewOther and then selecting MOTODEV StudioMOTODEV Video Tutorials .

section.p: The MOTODEV Video Tutorials view presents instructional videos from a dedicated YouTube channel that is maintained by Motorola Mobility. You can either watch these videos in the MOTODEV Video Tutorials view or in your browser. Select Open in External Browser to show the selected video in your default browser rather than in the view.
Use the view's Search box to search for terms within the video titles and descriptions.
